title: script typeface suitable for display needed
content:
i am looking for a decent script & display typeface, something along the lines of [nothing](http://web.archive.org/web/20120307031158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/nothing/) (and ideally included in adobe fontfolio or linotype gold collections)... any suggestions welcome.

i really appreciate how helpful people are in this forum. I would like to find an opportunity to give back, but it those are hard to come by given the general experience level around here...
author: typokallos

comments.content: Did your collections not come with printed catalogs?
left them in storage and also looking for new suggestions. i wish i could search by style too... but i've never seen a tool for the PC that can do that.
